title: DOOM Eternal
about: The ultimate combination of speed and power is back in this first-person shooter. As the DOOM Slayer, you return to find Earth suffering a demonic invasion. Raze hell and discover the Slayerâ€™s origins.

keyFeatures.title: Slayer Threat Level
keyFeatures.description: Wield powerful weapons and use advanced movement techniques to tear through demons.

keyFeatures.title: Resource Management Combat
keyFeatures.description: Utilize 'Glory Kills', the Chainsaw, and Flamethrower to gain health, ammo, and armor.

keyFeatures.title: Invasion Mode
keyFeatures.description: Allow other players to invade your campaign as demons for a challenging twist.

systemSpecs.Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
systemSpecs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), GTX 1650 (4GB) or AMD Radeon R9 Fury (4GB)
